title: Review: KOM Cycling detachable GoPro mount is really the best light mount
content:
There are a lot of ways to put a GoPro on you or your bike, but most of them require a bit of a commitment. Meaning, once you’ve threaded or clicked the camera into place and adjusted it, that’s probably where you’re leaving it for a while. KOM Cycling’s latest mount makes it a bit […]

The post Review: KOM Cycling detachable GoPro mount is really the best light mount appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
